SELECT TABLE_NAME,SEQUENCE_NAME,ALLOW_ADD,IS_STANDARD,CODE FROM PTRPARAMETER_REF WHERE ID = #PARAMETER_ID#

SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.DESCRIPTION, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.STATUS_ID,S.TYPE_ID,S.UNCONTACTABLE,T.DESCRIPTION,SR.DESCRIPTION, S.SUBTYPE_ID, SB.DESCRIPTION FROM PTRTREATMENT_TYPE_STATUS_REF S INNER JOIN PTRTREATMENT_TYPE_REF T ON T.ID=S.TYPE_ID INNER JOIN PTRTREATMENT_STATUS_REF SR ON SR.ID=S.STATUS_ID LEFT JOIN PTRTREATMENT_SUBTYPE_REF SB ON SB.ID=S.SUBTYPE_ID ORDER BY SORT_PRIORITY, DISABLE

SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.DESCRIPTION, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.COUNTRY_ID,S.REGION_ID,R.DESCRIPTION,RR.DESCRIPTION FROM PTRSTATE_REF S left JOIN PTRCOUNTRY_REF R ON R.ID=S.COUNTRY_ID LEFT JOIN PTRREGION_REF RR ON RR.ID = S.REGION_ID ORDER BY SORT_PRIORITY, DISABLE

SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.DESCRIPTION, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.SUBTYPE_ID,R.DESCRIPTION FROM PTRTREATMENT_ACCOUNT_CLASSIFICATION_TYPE_REF S INNER JOIN PTRTREATMENT_SUBTYPE_REF R ON R.ID=S.SUBTYPE_ID ORDER BY S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.DISABLE

SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.DESCRIPTION, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.ABBREVIATION,S.GROUP_ID,G.DESCRIPTION FROM PTRFACILITY_CODE_REF S INNER JOIN PTRFACILITY_TYPE_GROUP_REF G ON G.ID=S.GROUP_ID ORDER BY S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.DISABLE

SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.DESCRIPTION, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.GROUP_ID,R.DESCRIPTION FROM PTREMPLOYER_REF S INNER JOIN PTREMPLOYER_GROUP_REF R ON R.ID=S.GROUP_ID ORDER BY S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.DISABLE

SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.DESCRIPTION, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.abbreviation,S.category_id,R.DESCRIPTION,S.islamic_status,S.DIBS FROM PTRPRODUCT_TYPE_REF S inner join ptrproduct_type_category_ref R on S.CATEGORY_ID = R.ID ORDER BY S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.DISABLE
SELECT ID, CODE, DESCRIPTION, DISABLE, SORT_PRIORITY, is_islamic FROM PTRSPTF_TYPE_REF ORDER BY SORT_PRIORITY, DISABLE

SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.DESCRIPTION, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.BANK_ID, R.DESCRIPTION, RR.ID, RR.DESCRIPTION FROM PTRBANK_BRANCH_REF S INNER JOIN PTRBANK_REF R ON R.ID=S.BANK_ID LEFT JOIN PTRREGION_REF RR ON RR.ID=S.REGION_ID ORDER BY S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.DISABLE
sqlMap.insert:
$SEQUENCE_NAME$
insert into $TABLE_NAME$ (CODE, DESCRIPTION, DISABLE, BANK_ID,REGION_ID,SORT_PRIORITY, ID) values (#CODE#, #DESCRIPTION#, case when #DISABLE# = then else end, #BANK_ID#,#REGION_ID#,#SORT_PRIORITY#, #ID#)
sqlMap.update: update $TABLE_NAME$ set CODE = #CODE#, DESCRIPTION = #DESCRIPTION#, DISABLE = case when #DISABLE# = then else end, SORT_PRIORITY = #SORT_PRIORITY#, BANK_ID = #BANK_ID#, REGION_ID = #REGION_ID# where ID = #ID#
update $TABLE_NAME$ set CODE = #CODE#, DESCRIPTION = #DESCRIPTION#, DISABLE = case when #DISABLE# = then else end, SORT_PRIORITY = #SORT_PRIORITY# where ID = #ID#
sqlMap.insert:
$SEQUENCE_NAME$
insert into $TABLE_NAME$ (CODE, DESCRIPTION, DISABLE, SORT_PRIORITY, ID) values (#CODE#, #DESCRIPTION#, case when #DISABLE# = then else end, #SORT_PRIORITY#, #ID#)

$SEQUENCE_NAME$
insert into $TABLE_NAME$ (CODE, DESCRIPTION, DISABLE, MODULE,SORT_PRIORITY, ID) values (#CODE#, #DESCRIPTION#, case when #DISABLE# = then else end, 'ECA',#SORT_PRIORITY#, #ID#)

$SEQUENCE_NAME$
insert into $TABLE_NAME$ (CODE, DESCRIPTION, DISABLE, MODULE,SORT_PRIORITY, ID) values (#CODE#, #DESCRIPTION#, case when #DISABLE# = then else end, 'LEGAL',#SORT_PRIORITY#, #ID#)

FROM $TABLE_NAME$ where module like 'LEGAL' order by SORT_PRIORITY, DISABLE

sqlMap.insert:
$SEQUENCE_NAME$
insert into $TABLE_NAME$ (CODE, DESCRIPTION, DISABLE, SORT_PRIORITY, ID, ABBREVIATION,GROUP_ID) values (#CODE#, #DESCRIPTION#, case when #DISABLE# = then else end, #SORT_PRIORITY#, #ID#, #ABBREVIATION#, #GROUP_ID#)

update $TABLE_NAME$ set CODE = #CODE#, DESCRIPTION = #DESCRIPTION#, DISABLE = case when #DISABLE# = then else end, SORT_PRIORITY = #SORT_PRIORITY#, CATEGORY_ID = #CATEGORY_ID#, ABBREVIATION = #ABBREVIATION#, ISLAMIC_STATUS = #ISLAMIC_STATUS#, DIBS = #DIBS# where ID = #ID#

insert into $TABLE_NAME$ (CODE, DESCRIPTION, DISABLE, SORT_PRIORITY, ID, SUBTYPE_ID,CREATED_TIME,CREATED_BY) values (#CODE#, #DESCRIPTION#, case when #DISABLE# = then else end, #SORT_PRIORITY#, #ID#, #SUBTYPE_ID#,#CURRENT_TIME#,#LOGON_USER#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.DESCRIPTION, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.SUBTYPE_ID, R.DESCRIPTION FROM PTRLEGAL_ABORT_REASON_REF S INNER JOIN PTRTREATMENT_SUBTYPE_REF R ON R.ID=S.SUBTYPE_ID WHERE R.TYPE_ID IN(50,51,52) ORDER BY S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.DISABLE

SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.DESCRIPTION, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.SUBTYPE_ID, R.DESCRIPTION FROM PTRWITHHOLD_REASON_REF S INNER JOIN PTRTREATMENT_SUBTYPE_REF R ON R.ID=S.SUBTYPE_ID WHERE R.TYPE_ID IN(50,51,52) ORDER BY S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.DISABLE

SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.DESCRIPTION, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.SUBTYPE_ID, R.DESCRIPTION FROM PTRDISCONTINUED_ABORT_REASON_REF S INNER JOIN PTRTREATMENT_SUBTYPE_REF R ON R.ID=S.SUBTYPE_ID WHERE R.TYPE_ID IN(50,51,52) ORDER BY S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.DISABLE

SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.DESCRIPTION, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.SUBTYPE_ID, R.DESCRIPTION FROM PTRDISCONTINUED_ABORT_STATUS_REF S INNER JOIN PTRTREATMENT_SUBTYPE_REF R ON R.ID=S.SUBTYPE_ID WHERE R.TYPE_ID IN(50,51,52) ORDER BY S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.DISABLE

SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.DESCRIPTION, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.SUBTYPE_ID, R.DESCRIPTION FROM PTRPOSTPONEMENT_REASON_REF S INNER JOIN PTRTREATMENT_SUBTYPE_REF R ON R.ID=S.SUBTYPE_ID WHERE R.TYPE_ID IN(50,51,52) ORDER BY S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.DISABLE

SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.DESCRIPTION, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.SUBTYPE_ID, R.DESCRIPTION FROM PTRPOSTPONEMENT_STATUS_REF S INNER JOIN PTRTREATMENT_SUBTYPE_REF R ON R.ID=S.SUBTYPE_ID WHERE R.TYPE_ID IN(50,51,52) ORDER BY S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.DISABLE

SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.DESCRIPTION, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.SUBTYPE_ID, R.DESCRIPTION FROM PTRLEGAL_ACTION_AUCTION_STATUS_REF S INNER JOIN PTRTREATMENT_SUBTYPE_REF R ON R.ID=S.SUBTYPE_ID WHERE R.TYPE_ID IN(50,51,52) ORDER BY S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.DISABLE

SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.DESCRIPTION, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.SUBTYPE_ID, R.DESCRIPTION FROM PTRLEGAL_ACTION_UNSUCCESSFUL_REASONS_REF S INNER JOIN PTRTREATMENT_SUBTYPE_REF R ON R.ID=S.SUBTYPE_ID WHERE R.TYPE_ID IN(50,51,52) ORDER BY S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.DISABLE

SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.DESCRIPTION, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.SUBTYPE_ID, R.DESCRIPTION FROM PTRLEGAL_EXCLUSION_REASON_REF S INNER JOIN PTRTREATMENT_SUBTYPE_REF R ON R.ID=S.SUBTYPE_ID WHERE R.TYPE_ID IN(50,51,52) ORDER BY S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.DISABLE
sqlMap.insert:
$SEQUENCE_NAME$
insert into $TABLE_NAME$ (CODE, DESCRIPTION, DISABLE, SORT_PRIORITY, ID, SUBTYPE_ID) values (#CODE#, #DESCRIPTION#, case when #DISABLE# = then else end, #SORT_PRIORITY#, #ID#, #SUBTYPE_ID#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.DESCRIPTION, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.SUBTYPE_ID, R.DESCRIPTION FROM PTRLEGAL_ABORT_REASON_REF S INNER JOIN PTRTREATMENT_SUBTYPE_REF R ON R.ID=S.SUBTYPE_ID WHERE R.TYPE_ID IN(19) ORDER BY S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.DISABLE
SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.TASK_PHASE, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.TASK_PHASE,S.TAT FROM PTRAGENCY_TAT_REF S ORDER BY S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.DISABLE
sqlMap.update: update $TABLE_NAME$ set DISABLE = case when #DISABLE# = then else end, SORT_PRIORITY = #SORT_PRIORITY#, TAT = #TAT# where ID = #ID#
sqlMap.select: SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.TASK_PHASE, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.TASK_PHASE,S.MODULE,S.TAT FROM PTRBILLING_TAT_REF S where s.module like 'ECA' ORDER BY S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.DISABLE
SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.TASK_PHASE, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.TASK_PHASE,S.MODULE,S.TAT FROM PTRBILLING_TAT_REF S where s.module like 'LEGAL' ORDER BY S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.DISABLE
sqlMap.update: update $TABLE_NAME$ set DISABLE = case when #DISABLE# = then else end, SORT_PRIORITY = #SORT_PRIORITY#, TAT = #TAT# where ID = #ID#
sqlMap.select: select r.id,r.subtype_id,s.description,ptc.description,ptc.id,r.day from ptrassignment_abort_period_ref r inner join ptrtreatment_subtype_ref s on s.id=r.subtype_id inner join ptrproduct_type_category_ref ptc on ptc.id=r.product_type_category_id where s.type_id=19
select r.id,r.subtype_id,s.description,null,null,r.day from ptrassignment_abort_period_ref r inner join ptrtreatment_subtype_ref s on s.id=r.subtype_id where s.type_id!=19

SELECT C.ID, C.CODE, C.DESCRIPTION, C.DISABLE, C.SORT_PRIORITY, C.STATE_ID,S.DESCRIPTION FROM PTRCITY_REF C INNER JOIN PTRSTATE_REF S ON S.ID=C.STATE_ID LEFT JOIN PTRREGION_REF RR ON RR.ID = S.REGION_ID ORDER BY SORT_PRIORITY, DISABLE
sqlMap.update: update $TABLE_NAME$ set CODE = #CODE#, DESCRIPTION = #DESCRIPTION#, DISABLE = case when #DISABLE# = then else end, SORT_PRIORITY = #SORT_PRIORITY#, STATE_ID = #STATE_ID#, where ID = #ID#

sqlMap.update: update $TABLE_NAME$ set CODE = #CODE#, DESCRIPTION = #DESCRIPTION#, DISABLE = case when #DISABLE# = then else end, SORT_PRIORITY = #SORT_PRIORITY#, DAY = #DAY# where ID = #ID#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ID, PROFILE_NAME, ADDRESS_1, DISABLE, SORT_PRIORITY, PROFILE_NAME,ADDRESS_1,ADDRESS_2,ADDRESS_3,POSTCODE,STATE, TEL,FAX,GST_NO FROM PTRMBSB_PROFILE_REF
sqlMap.update: update $TABLE_NAME$ set PROFILE_NAME = #PROFILE_NAME#, ADDRESS_1 = #ADDRESS_1#, ADDRESS_2 = #ADDRESS_2#, ADDRESS_3 = #ADDRESS_3#, POSTCODE = #POSTCODE#, STATE = #STATE#, TEL = #TEL#, FAX = #FAX#, GST_NO = #GST_NO#, DISABLE = case when #DISABLE# = then else end, SORT_PRIORITY = #SORT_PRIORITY# where ID = #ID#

sqlMap.update: update $TABLE_NAME$ set CODE = #CODE#, DESCRIPTION = #DESCRIPTION#, DISABLE = case when #DISABLE# = then else end, SORT_PRIORITY = #SORT_PRIORITY#, SUBTYPE_ID = #SUBTYPE_ID#, where ID = #ID#
sqlMap.insert:

sqlMap.select: SELECT id, field_description, sms, letter, VISITATION, LEGAL, ECA, DISABLE, SORT_PRIORITY from ptrdecision_tree_condition_ref ORDER BY SORT_PRIORITY, DISABLE
sqlMap.update: update $TABLE_NAME$ set FIELD_DESCRIPTION = #DESCRIPTION#, DISABLE = case when #DISABLE# = then else end, SORT_PRIORITY = #SORT_PRIORITY#, SMS = #SMS#, LETTER = #LETTER#, VISITATION = #VISITATION#, LEGAL = #LEGAL#, ECA = #ECA# where ID = #ID#
sqlMap.select: select e.id, e.employee_position_id, p.description, e.escalation_type_id, s.description, e.disable from PTRESCALATION_TYPE_REF e left join ptremployee_position_ref p on p.id=e.employee_position_id left join ptrtreatment_subtype_ref s on s.id=e.escalation_type_id order by e.sort_priority, e.disable

sqlMap.select:
union
from PTRSTATE_REF
union select us.user_id, '' as code, us.user_id, us.disable, 1 as sort_priority from ptremployee e inner join ptruser us on us.employee_id=e.id

SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.DESCRIPTION, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, ST.ID, ST.DESCRIPTION, a.USER_ID, a.USER_ID, b.USER_ID, b.USER_ID FROM PTRAREA_REF S left JOIN PTRSTATE_REF ST ON ST.ID=S.STATE_ID left join PTRUSER a on a.USER_ID=s.VISITATION_STAFF_ID left join PTRUSER b on b.USER_ID=s.SUPERVISOR_ID ORDER BY S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.DISABLE

sqlMap.update: update ptragency_invoice_number_ref set starting_no=#STARTING_NUMBER#, last_no=#LAST_NUMBER#, prefix=#PREFIX# where ID=#ID#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ID, CODE, DESCRIPTION, DISABLE, SORT_PRIORITY,SUBTYPE_ID FROM PTRHOST_CCRIS_STATUS_REF ORDER BY SORT_PRIORITY, DISABLE
sqlMap.update: update $TABLE_NAME$ set CODE = #CODE#, DESCRIPTION = #DESCRIPTION#, DISABLE = case when #DISABLE# = then else end, SORT_PRIORITY = #SORT_PRIORITY#, SUBTYPE_ID = #SUBTYPE_ID# where ID = #ID#
sqlMap.insert:
$SEQUENCE_NAME$
insert into $TABLE_NAME$ (CODE, DESCRIPTION, DISABLE, SORT_PRIORITY, ID, SUBTYPE_ID) values (#CODE#, #DESCRIPTION#, case when #DISABLE# = then else end, #SORT_PRIORITY#, #ID#, #SUBTYPE_ID#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT S.ID, S.CODE, S.DESCRIPTION, S.DISABLE, S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.SUBTYPE_ID, R.DESCRIPTION FROM PTRLEGAL_KIV_REASON_REF S INNER JOIN PTRTREATMENT_SUBTYPE_REF R ON R.ID=S.SUBTYPE_ID WHERE R.TYPE_ID IN(50,51,52) ORDER BY S.SORT_PRIORITY, S.DISABLE
sqlMap.update: update $TABLE_NAME$ set CODE = #CODE#, DESCRIPTION = #DESCRIPTION#, DISABLE = case when #DISABLE# = then else end, SORT_PRIORITY = #SORT_PRIORITY#, SUBTYPE_ID = #SUBTYPE_ID# where ID = #ID#
sqlMap.insert:
$SEQUENCE_NAME$
insert into $TABLE_NAME$ (CODE, DESCRIPTION, DISABLE, SORT_PRIORITY, ID, SUBTYPE_ID) values (#CODE#, #DESCRIPTION#, case when #DISABLE# = then else end, #SORT_PRIORITY#, #ID#, #SUBTYPE_ID#)
